author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter DESIGN-NICHE framing tips…I need to support all four sides of the niche but the studs are too far apart. I cut 1/2” plywood to solve that problem and can use 2x4s for the top/bottom. The inside of this aluminum niche is powder coated and comes in different colors which complement the tile design 🔥#showerniche #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Schluter DESIGN-NICHE Framing Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #showerniche #homerepairtutor
